doc.name: FileReader
doc.description: This actor reads a file or URL and outputs the entire file as a single string. The file or URL is specified using any form acceptable to FileParameter.
doc.author: Yang Zhao (contributor: Edward A. Lee)
doc.port: An input port for optionally providing a file name. This has type string.
doc.property: The file name or URL from which to read. This is a string with any form accepted by FileParameter.
The end of line character(s). The default value is the value of the line.separator property
